files.patch:
@@ -193,0 +193,5 @@ + *

+ * The type of the value returned for this option, by {@link #getOption(int)} or accepted by + * {@link #setOption(int, Object)}, can either be a {@linkplain Boolean#FALSE Boolean.FALSE} + * or an integer value. {@code Boolean.FALSE} represents that this option is disabled whereas + * an integer value represents the linger timeout.
